data.text: @sailoramberr Absolutely. I’ve always felt the rushed engagement to Pete Davidson was a response of sadness about the loss of the relationship with Mac. I’ve always thought the erratic behavior on her part since was a direct response of the breakup. But that still doesn’t mean she’s to blame
@1ztBornUnicorn I wish they’d stop mentioning her.  My heart breaks for her so much.
Is this real life?? WTF https://t.co/8ztxWmZdEK
@1ztBornUnicorn Thank you!!! Some of the shit I’ve seen posted today has me so heated!  People are fucking cruel and heartless.

Look at this. How is this productive??

If you don’t understand how someone died don’t speak. https://t.co/DducghpEJQ
@1ztBornUnicorn How unbelievable. Every time we lose someone to an od I just cry. Why? Why the fuck was it his time or anyone's time who is young. My God.

@Sn0wkiss3sx0 I don’t either but my bf and his brother love him so I’ve heard it so much 
He definitely had talent. It’s unfortunate drugs took someone else
@1ztBornUnicorn Oh wow....damn.... 😭 I didn't listen to much of his music but that's fkn awful...
@Sn0wkiss3sx0 Yeah. OD at his house this morning. A friend found him
@1ztBornUnicorn Shut the fuck up Mac Miller died?????
